name: Fetch Dedicated Account with invalid ID
fullName: Virtual accounts/Fetch Dedicated Account#Fetch Dedicated Account with invalid ID
description:
Get details of a dedicated virtual account on your integration.

Endpoint: /dedicated_account/:id  
Method: GET

#### Header

| Param | Type | Required? | Decription |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| _authorization_ | string | Yes | Set value to _Bearer SECRET_KEY_ |

#### Path Param

| Param | Type | Required? | Decription |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| _id_ | integer | Yes | ID of dedicated virtual account |
